name: Fox Adventures
description:
Hello! Fox Adventures is a pixel-art platformer developed mostly to show my programming skills.  Maybe there are some bugs but I really hope you enjoy the game.

Your objective as a player is just jump on enemies to destroy them and collect items. Keep an eye on secret passages and the yellow stars (that give you one life).

Controls:

  • Left/Right - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • Space twice - Double Jump
  • Down - Fall from some places
